title: Artifact URL Request
description: Request for signed URLs to which artifacts can be uploaded

runId.description: `run-id` for which artifact PUT URLs are requested.

workerGroup.description: Worker group on which the requesting run is running.

workerId.description: Identifier for worker within the given workerGroup

artifacts.description: Mapping from artifact name to meta-data about artifact, currently only `contentType` is requested, **more will** be added.

additionalProperties.description: Artifact meta-data, used for signing the URL

contentType.description: Artifact mime-type, when uploading artifact to the signed `PUT` URL returned from this request this must given with the `ContentType` header. Please, provide correct mime-type, this make tooling a lot easier, specifically, always using `application/json` for JSON artifacts.
